name: Adventure Ice Bear Run
description:
Adventure Ice Bear Run is fundamental platform game with new frozen ice theme and environments with amazing power ups and more adventure land to explore.

Slip, slide, and jump your way through this frozen game to discover the new ice world. Help the bear run , jump and slide to reach home in Ice Land. Beware of
obstacles and complete all the stages to reach bear home.

Game Features :
1. Lots of Challenging Levels.
2. Classic platform runner game .
3. Cool Background Music.
4. Smooth gameplay and movement.
5. New unique ice water surfers.

Download now to let the fun begin!!!
